thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 4 of 78
thread.title: Elizabeth
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text: I have been using the shower filter for over a year now and it has made such a difference in my hair. My hair used to be dry and now I don't have that problem. I just wish Pelican would have people that install their whole house filters. I had to go with another company because I couldn't get anyone to install the system from Pelican. Even though I have a whole house system now, I will still use the Pelican shower filter just to be on the safe side. They also have super fast shipping!!
